","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Donation to a Homeless Shelter","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We completed a food distribution initiative this month to distribute 10 packs of 60 donuts to the homeless across Toronto. childMarkdownRemark.html: In November 2020, Blankets for T.O. donated donuts to a local shelter and also promoted a local small business on campus.
childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: In November 2020, Blankets for T.O. donated donuts to a local shelter and also promoted a local small business on campus.
